response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, we believe it is worth $800,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an exceptional value while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. We understand the importance of making a decision that aligns with both your interests and ours. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any additional information to make your decision.", "product_price": 750000}
